content: Once you reach the Snake Trail Keeper's Shrine, run up the stairs on the right and take a left. You will come across a flimsy fence on the edge of a cliff on the left. Smash the fence and drop into the river below. Run to the right to find Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang_Spirit.md", within the section "Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang Spirit" and the sub-section "Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang Location". The content is presented below:

Once you reach the Snake Trail Keeper's Shrine, run up the stairs on the right and take a left. You will come across a flimsy fence on the edge of a cliff on the left. Smash the fence and drop into the river below. Run to the right to find Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang.
